tool_description:
A list of current Developer Jobs from top German websites, including Linkedin and Indeed...

This API is for people that want to search for English developer jobs in Germany. The list is updated with each load. this means that you may have to reload the page multiple times in order to get the results you are looking for. 

The API returns:
1) full Job title 
2) Link to the Job advertisement
3) the source of the advertisement
title: Job Listings Live

api_list.name: List All Jobs Available In Array
api_list.description: List all Developer jobs available in Germany and the UK.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://job-listings-live.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-listings-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
